thread.section_title: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand | acerentalcars.co.nz
thread.title: John
thread.title_full: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand reviewed by John

author: John
title: John
text:
I am very happy to recommend ACE CAR RENTAL.
I hired a very nice Toyota Corolla for a two week tour of the North Island. The car was clean, comfortable and trouble-free. ACE run a convenient shuttle to and from the airport and are only a short walk away. You pick the car up with a full tank of fuel and you return it with a full tank. A petrol station is just around the corner from ACE rental so no last minute desperate search for fuel.
No last minute spurious claims for mysterious damage that seems to plague some other rental companies, so highly recommended!
